sentences.sContent: The campaign failed because of public apathy.
sentences.sCn: 由于公众反应冷淡，这次运动失败了。

synos.tran: 冷漠，无兴趣，漠不关心；无感情

words.tran: 冷漠的；无动于衷的，缺乏兴趣的
冷淡地；无动于衷地；不感兴趣地

trans.tranCn: 冷漠，无兴趣，漠不关心；无感情
trans.tranOther: the feeling of not being interested in something, and not willing to make any effort to change or improve things
